mapper.select: select e.id, e.lab from EQUIPO as e WHERE e.lab = #{lab}

select e.id as ideq, e.activo as aceq, e.lab as laeq, p.id as pa_id, p.name as pa_name, p.descripcion as pa_desc, p.idequipo as pa_ideq, p.tipo as pa_tipo, m.id as mo_id, m.name as mo_name, m.descripcion as mo_desc, m.idequipo as mo_ideq, m.tipo as mo_tipo, t.id as torre_id, t.name as torre_name, t.idequipo as torre_ideq, t.descripcion as torre_desc, t.tipo as torre_tipo, k.id as ke_id, k.name as ke_name, k.idequipo as ke_ideq, k.descripcion as ke_desc, k.tipo as ke_tipo from EQUIPO e left outer join elemento as p on p.idequipo = e.id and p.tipo='pantalla' left outer join elemento as m on m.idequipo = e.id and m.tipo='mouse' left outer join elemento as t on t.idequipo = e.id and t.tipo='torre' left outer join elemento as k on k.idequipo = e.id and k.tipo='teclado'
select e.id as ideq, e.activo as aceq, e.lab as laeq from EQUIPO as e WHERE e.id = #{id}
